document.full_text: airlines began cancelling flights to britain late on monday because of an ash cloud from an icelandic volcano reaching its airspace, although experts expected no repeat of travel chaos from an eruption a year ago.
document.title: europe on alert for icelandic volcano ash cloud
lines_and_colors: airlines began cancelling flights to britain late on monday because of an ash cloud from an icelandic volcano reaching its airspace, although experts expected no repeat of travel chaos from an eruption a year ago.
